Multivariable Calculus | Stoke's Theorem

\begin{array}{l}\n\oint_{\partial \Sigma} \vec{F} \cdot d \vec{r} \\\n\iint_{\Sigma}(\vec{\nabla} \times \vec{F}) \cdot d \vec{S}\n\end{array}[imath]\oint_{\partial \Sigma} \vec{F} \cdot d \vec{r} [/imath] [imath]\iint_{\Sigma}(\vec{abla} \times \vec{F}) \cdot d \vec{S}[/imath]
